1.name: ARTICLE B. - STREET AND SIDEWALK STANDARDS
1.label: article

full_text:
(a) Major and minor thoroughfares, fifty-three (53) feet (16.6 meters) or more;(b) Collector street, forty-one (41) feet (12.50 meters);(c) Commercial street, forty-one (41) feet (12.50 meters);(d) Residential collector street, thirty-six (36) feet (10.97 meters), but forty-one (41) feet (12.50 meters) within three hundred (300) feet of a collector street or thoroughfare system roadway intersection.(e) Residential street, thirty-one (31) feet (9.45 meters);(f) Minor residential street, twenty-six (26) feet (7.92 meters). 
(Ord. No. 1987-69, §4, 10-20-87; Ord. No. 1995-760-TC-122, §5, TC-20C-95, 11-21-95)
